targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time - time % ((($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)::integer) AS time,
  MAX(host || ':' || port) AS Endpoint,
  MAX(role) AS Role,
  MAX(version) AS Version
FROM polar_gawr_collection.get_data_from_proper_table(NULL::${LogicInstance}.view_fact_dbmetrics, $__unixEpochFrom(), $__unixEpochTo(), ($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
WHERE
  physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}'
GROUP BY time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER) AS time,
  MAX(cpu_cores) AS "cpu cores",
  ROUND((MAX(mem_total) / 1024.0)::NUMERIC, 2) AS "memory(GB)",
  ROUND((MAX(fs_size_total) / 1024.0)::NUMERIC, 2) AS "disk size(GB)"
FROM polar_gawr_collection.get_data_from_proper_table(NULL::${LogicInstance}.view_fact_dbmetrics, $__unixEpochFrom(), $__unixEpochTo(), ($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
WHERE
  physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}'
GROUP BY time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER) AS time,
  AVG(commits_delta+rollbacks_delta) AS TPS
FROM polar_gawr_collection.get_data_from_proper_table(NULL::${LogicInstance}.view_fact_dbmetrics, $__unixEpochFrom(), $__unixEpochTo(), ($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
WHERE
  physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}'
GROUP BY time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER) AS time,
  AVG(active_connections) AS 活跃连接
FROM polar_gawr_collection.get_data_from_proper_table(NULL::${LogicInstance}.view_fact_dbmetrics, $__unixEpochFrom(), $__unixEpochTo(), ($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
WHERE
  physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}'
GROUP BY time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER) AS time,
  AVG(cpu_total_usage)
FROM polar_gawr_collection.get_data_from_proper_table(NULL::${LogicInstance}.view_fact_dbmetrics, $__unixEpochFrom(), $__unixEpochTo(), ($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
WHERE
  physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}'
GROUP BY time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER) AS time,
  AVG(mem_total_usage)
FROM polar_gawr_collection.get_data_from_proper_table(NULL::${LogicInstance}.view_fact_dbmetrics, $__unixEpochFrom(), $__unixEpochTo(), ($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
WHERE
  physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}'
GROUP BY time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER) AS time,
  AVG(blks_hit_delta / (blks_hit_delta + blks_read_delta + 1))
FROM polar_gawr_collection.get_data_from_proper_table(NULL::${LogicInstance}.view_fact_dbmetrics, $__unixEpochFrom(), $__unixEpochTo(), ($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
WHERE
  physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}'
GROUP BY time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER) AS time,
  AVG(fs_blocks_usage)
FROM polar_gawr_collection.get_data_from_proper_table(NULL::${LogicInstance}.view_fact_dbmetrics, $__unixEpochFrom(), $__unixEpochTo(), ($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
WHERE
  physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}'
GROUP BY time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER) AS time,
  wait_event_type::text || ':' || wait_event AS metric,
  CASE WHEN ($__interval_ms / 1000) >= 3600 THEN ROUND(CAST(SUM(wait_count) AS NUMERIC) / (($__interval_ms / 3600 / 1000)::INTEGER), 2)::FLOAT
      WHEN ($__interval_ms / 1000) >= 60 THEN ROUND(CAST(SUM(wait_count) AS NUMERIC) / (($__interval_ms / 60 / 1000)::INTEGER), 2)::FLOAT
      ELSE ROUND(CAST(SUM(wait_count) AS NUMERIC) / (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER), 2)::FLOAT END AS wait_count
FROM polar_gawr_collection.get_data_from_proper_table(NULL::${LogicInstance}.view_fact_polar_aas_history, $__unixEpochFrom(), $__unixEpochTo(), ($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
WHERE
  physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}'
GROUP BY time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER), metric
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  queryid, SUM(wait_count) AS 总等待事件, array_agg(wait_event || ': ' || ROUND(wait_count::NUMERIC, 2) ORDER BY wait_count DESC) FILTER (WHERE wait_count > 0.01) AS 等待事件详情
FROM (
SELECT
  'queryid: ' || queryid AS queryid,
  wait_event_type || ':' || wait_event AS wait_event,
  ROUND(CAST(SUM(wait_count) AS NUMERIC) / ($__unixEpochTo() - $__unixEpochFrom()), 2)::FLOAT AS wait_count
FROM polar_gawr_collection.get_data_from_proper_table(NULL::${LogicInstance}.view_fact_polar_aas_history, $__unixEpochFrom(), $__unixEpochTo(), ($__unixEpochTo() - $__unixEpochFrom())::INTEGER)
WHERE
  physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}' AND queryid != '0'
GROUP BY queryid, wait_event_type || ':' || wait_event
) a
GROUP BY queryid
ORDER BY SUM(wait_count) DESC 
LIMIT 10

SELECT
  time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER) AS time,
  AVG(cpu_user_usage) AS 用户态,
  AVG(cpu_sys_usage) AS 系统态
FROM polar_gawr_collection.get_data_from_proper_table(NULL::${LogicInstance}.view_fact_dbmetrics, $__unixEpochFrom(), $__unixEpochTo(), ($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
WHERE
  physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}'
GROUP BY time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT time, metric, cpu FROM (
SELECT
  time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER) AS time,
  backend_type AS metric,
  AVG(cpu_user+cpu_sys) AS cpu
FROM polar_gawr_collection.get_data_from_proper_table(NULL::${LogicInstance}.view_fact_polar_stat_process, $__unixEpochFrom(), $__unixEpochTo(), ($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
WHERE
  physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}' AND
  $__unixEpochFilter(time)
GROUP BY time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER), backend_type
UNION ALL
SELECT
  time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER) AS time,
  'postmaster' AS metric,
  AVG(postmaster_cpu) AS cpu
FROM polar_gawr_collection.get_data_from_proper_table(NULL::${LogicInstance}.view_fact_dbmetrics, $__unixEpochFrom(), $__unixEpochTo(), ($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
WHERE
  physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}' AND
  $__unixEpochFilter(time)
GROUP BY time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
UNION ALL
SELECT
  time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER) AS time,
  'logger' AS metric,
  AVG(logger_cpu) AS cpu
FROM polar_gawr_collection.get_data_from_proper_table(NULL::${LogicInstance}.view_fact_dbmetrics, $__unixEpochFrom(), $__unixEpochTo(), ($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
WHERE
  physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}' AND
  $__unixEpochFilter(time)
GROUP BY time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
UNION ALL
SELECT
  time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER) AS time,
  'pgstat' AS metric,
  AVG(pgstat_cpu) AS cpu
FROM polar_gawr_collection.get_data_from_proper_table(NULL::${LogicInstance}.view_fact_dbmetrics, $__unixEpochFrom(), $__unixEpochTo(), ($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
WHERE
  physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}' AND
  $__unixEpochFilter(time)
GROUP BY time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
) a ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER) AS time,
  MAX(mem_total_usage) AS 内存使用率
FROM polar_gawr_collection.get_data_from_proper_table(NULL::${LogicInstance}.view_fact_dbmetrics, $__unixEpochFrom(), $__unixEpochTo(), ($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
WHERE
  physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}'
GROUP BY time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT time, metric, rss FROM (
SELECT
  time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER) AS time,
  backend_type AS metric,
  AVG(rss) AS rss
FROM polar_gawr_collection.get_data_from_proper_table(NULL::${LogicInstance}.view_fact_polar_stat_process, $__unixEpochFrom(), $__unixEpochTo(), ($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
WHERE
  physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}'
GROUP BY time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER), backend_type
UNION ALL
SELECT
  time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER) AS time,
  'postmaster' AS metric,
  AVG(postmaster_mem) AS rss
FROM polar_gawr_collection.get_data_from_proper_table(NULL::${LogicInstance}.view_fact_dbmetrics, $__unixEpochFrom(), $__unixEpochTo(), ($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
WHERE
  physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}'
GROUP BY time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
UNION ALL
SELECT
  time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER) AS time,
  'pgstat' AS metric,
  AVG(pgstat_mem) AS rss
FROM polar_gawr_collection.get_data_from_proper_table(NULL::${LogicInstance}.view_fact_dbmetrics, $__unixEpochFrom(), $__unixEpochTo(), ($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
WHERE
  physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}'
GROUP BY time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
UNION ALL
SELECT
  time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER) AS time,
  'logger' AS metric,
  AVG(logger_mem) AS rss
FROM polar_gawr_collection.get_data_from_proper_table(NULL::${LogicInstance}.view_fact_dbmetrics, $__unixEpochFrom(), $__unixEpochTo(), ($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
WHERE
  physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}'
GROUP BY time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
) a ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER) AS time,
  AVG(mem_rss) AS rss,
  AVG(mem_cache) AS cache,
  AVG(mem_inactiverss) AS inactiverss,
  AVG(mem_inactivecache) AS inactivecache,
  AVG(mem_mapped_file) AS mapped_file
FROM polar_gawr_collection.get_data_from_proper_table(NULL::${LogicInstance}.view_fact_dbmetrics, $__unixEpochFrom(), $__unixEpochTo(), ($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
WHERE
  physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}'
GROUP BY time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT pid AS 进程id, rss_mb AS "RSS(MB)", TO_CHAR(TO_TIMESTAMP(time), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS 对应时间点, query AS query
                            FROM ${LogicInstance}.view_fact_polar_stat_max_memory_sql 
                            WHERE time BETWEEN $__unixEpochFrom() AND $__unixEpochTo() AND physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}'
                            ORDER BY rss_mb DESC, time DESC LIMIT 10

panels.title: Top 内存占用会话 (200MB以上)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER) AS time,
  AVG(pls_iops_read) AS read,
  AVG(pls_iops_write) AS write
FROM polar_gawr_collection.get_data_from_proper_table(NULL::${LogicInstance}.view_fact_dbmetrics, $__unixEpochFrom(), $__unixEpochTo(), ($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
WHERE
  physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}'
GROUP BY time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER) AS time,
  AVG(pls_throughput_read) AS read,
  AVG(pls_throughput_write) AS write
FROM polar_gawr_collection.get_data_from_proper_table(NULL::${LogicInstance}.view_fact_dbmetrics, $__unixEpochFrom(), $__unixEpochTo(), ($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
WHERE
  physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}'
GROUP BY time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER) AS time,
  AVG(pls_latency_read) AS read,
  AVG(pls_latency_write) AS write
FROM polar_gawr_collection.get_data_from_proper_table(NULL::${LogicInstance}.view_fact_dbmetrics, $__unixEpochFrom(), $__unixEpochTo(), ($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
WHERE
  physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}'
GROUP BY time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER) AS time,
  backend_type AS metric,
  AVG(shared_read_ps+shared_write_ps) AS IOPS
FROM polar_gawr_collection.get_data_from_proper_table(NULL::${LogicInstance}.view_fact_polar_stat_process, $__unixEpochFrom(), $__unixEpochTo(), ($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
WHERE
  physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}'
GROUP BY time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER), backend_type
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER) AS time,
  backend_type AS metric,
  AVG(shared_read_throughput+shared_write_throughput) AS IOPS
FROM polar_gawr_collection.get_data_from_proper_table(NULL::${LogicInstance}.view_fact_polar_stat_process, $__unixEpochFrom(), $__unixEpochTo(), ($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
WHERE
  physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}'
GROUP BY time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER), backend_type
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: IO吞吐: 按进程类型堆叠

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER) AS time,
  filetype AS metric,
  AVG(read_count) AS read_iops
FROM polar_gawr_collection.get_data_from_proper_table(NULL::${LogicInstance}.view_fact_polar_stat_io_info, $__unixEpochFrom(), $__unixEpochTo(), ($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
WHERE
  physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}' AND fileloc='pfs'
GROUP BY time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER), filetype
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER) AS time,
  filetype AS metric,
  AVG(write_count) AS write_iops
FROM polar_gawr_collection.get_data_from_proper_table(NULL::${LogicInstance}.view_fact_polar_stat_io_info, $__unixEpochFrom(), $__unixEpochTo(), ($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
WHERE
  physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}' AND fileloc='pfs'
GROUP BY time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER), filetype
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER) AS time,
  filetype AS metric,
  AVG(seek_count) AS seek_iops
FROM polar_gawr_collection.get_data_from_proper_table(NULL::${LogicInstance}.view_fact_polar_stat_io_info, $__unixEpochFrom(), $__unixEpochTo(), ($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
WHERE
  physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}' AND fileloc='pfs'
GROUP BY time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER), filetype
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER) AS time,
  filetype AS metric,
  AVG(open_count) AS open_iops
FROM polar_gawr_collection.get_data_from_proper_table(NULL::${LogicInstance}.view_fact_polar_stat_io_info, $__unixEpochFrom(), $__unixEpochTo(), ($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
WHERE
  physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}' AND fileloc='pfs'
GROUP BY time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER), filetype
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER) AS time,
  AVG(num_lessthan200us / (num_lessthan200us+num_lessthan400us+num_lessthan1ms+num_lessthan10ms+num_lessthan100ms+num_morethan100ms+1)) AS "[0, 200us]",
  AVG(num_lessthan400us / (num_lessthan200us+num_lessthan400us+num_lessthan1ms+num_lessthan10ms+num_lessthan100ms+num_morethan100ms+1)) AS "(200us, 400us]",
  AVG(num_lessthan1ms / (num_lessthan200us+num_lessthan400us+num_lessthan1ms+num_lessthan10ms+num_lessthan100ms+num_morethan100ms+1)) AS "(400us, 1ms]",
  AVG(num_lessthan10ms / (num_lessthan200us+num_lessthan400us+num_lessthan1ms+num_lessthan10ms+num_lessthan100ms+num_morethan100ms+1)) AS "(1ms, 10ms]",
  AVG(num_lessthan100ms / (num_lessthan200us+num_lessthan400us+num_lessthan1ms+num_lessthan10ms+num_lessthan100ms+num_morethan100ms+1)) AS "(10ms, 100ms]",
  AVG(num_morethan100ms / (num_lessthan200us+num_lessthan400us+num_lessthan1ms+num_lessthan10ms+num_lessthan100ms+num_morethan100ms+1)) AS "(100ms, )"
FROM polar_gawr_collection.get_data_from_proper_table(NULL::${LogicInstance}.view_fact_polar_stat_io_latency, $__unixEpochFrom(), $__unixEpochTo(), ($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
WHERE
  physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}' AND iotype='read'
GROUP BY time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER) AS time,
  AVG(num_lessthan200us / (num_lessthan200us+num_lessthan400us+num_lessthan1ms+num_lessthan10ms+num_lessthan100ms+num_morethan100ms+1)) AS "[0, 200us]",
  AVG(num_lessthan400us / (num_lessthan200us+num_lessthan400us+num_lessthan1ms+num_lessthan10ms+num_lessthan100ms+num_morethan100ms+1)) AS "(200us, 400us]",
  AVG(num_lessthan1ms / (num_lessthan200us+num_lessthan400us+num_lessthan1ms+num_lessthan10ms+num_lessthan100ms+num_morethan100ms+1)) AS "(400us, 1ms]",
  AVG(num_lessthan10ms / (num_lessthan200us+num_lessthan400us+num_lessthan1ms+num_lessthan10ms+num_lessthan100ms+num_morethan100ms+1)) AS "(1ms, 10ms]",
  AVG(num_lessthan100ms / (num_lessthan200us+num_lessthan400us+num_lessthan1ms+num_lessthan10ms+num_lessthan100ms+num_morethan100ms+1)) AS "(10ms, 100ms]",
  AVG(num_morethan100ms / (num_lessthan200us+num_lessthan400us+num_lessthan1ms+num_lessthan10ms+num_lessthan100ms+num_morethan100ms+1)) AS "(100ms, )"
FROM polar_gawr_collection.get_data_from_proper_table(NULL::${LogicInstance}.view_fact_polar_stat_io_latency, $__unixEpochFrom(), $__unixEpochTo(), ($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
WHERE
  physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}' AND iotype='write'
GROUP BY time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER) AS time,
  AVG(num_lessthan200us / (num_lessthan200us+num_lessthan400us+num_lessthan1ms+num_lessthan10ms+num_lessthan100ms+num_morethan100ms+1)) AS "[0, 200us]",
  AVG(num_lessthan400us / (num_lessthan200us+num_lessthan400us+num_lessthan1ms+num_lessthan10ms+num_lessthan100ms+num_morethan100ms+1)) AS "(200us, 400us]",
  AVG(num_lessthan1ms / (num_lessthan200us+num_lessthan400us+num_lessthan1ms+num_lessthan10ms+num_lessthan100ms+num_morethan100ms+1)) AS "(400us, 1ms]",
  AVG(num_lessthan10ms / (num_lessthan200us+num_lessthan400us+num_lessthan1ms+num_lessthan10ms+num_lessthan100ms+num_morethan100ms+1)) AS "(1ms, 10ms]",
  AVG(num_lessthan100ms / (num_lessthan200us+num_lessthan400us+num_lessthan1ms+num_lessthan10ms+num_lessthan100ms+num_morethan100ms+1)) AS "(10ms, 100ms]",
  AVG(num_morethan100ms / (num_lessthan200us+num_lessthan400us+num_lessthan1ms+num_lessthan10ms+num_lessthan100ms+num_morethan100ms+1)) AS "(100ms, )"
FROM polar_gawr_collection.get_data_from_proper_table(NULL::${LogicInstance}.view_fact_polar_stat_io_latency, $__unixEpochFrom(), $__unixEpochTo(), ($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
WHERE
  physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}' AND iotype='seek'
GROUP BY time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER) AS time,
  AVG(num_lessthan200us / (num_lessthan200us+num_lessthan400us+num_lessthan1ms+num_lessthan10ms+num_lessthan100ms+num_morethan100ms+1)) AS "[0, 200us]",
  AVG(num_lessthan400us / (num_lessthan200us+num_lessthan400us+num_lessthan1ms+num_lessthan10ms+num_lessthan100ms+num_morethan100ms+1)) AS "(200us, 400us]",
  AVG(num_lessthan1ms / (num_lessthan200us+num_lessthan400us+num_lessthan1ms+num_lessthan10ms+num_lessthan100ms+num_morethan100ms+1)) AS "(400us, 1ms]",
  AVG(num_lessthan10ms / (num_lessthan200us+num_lessthan400us+num_lessthan1ms+num_lessthan10ms+num_lessthan100ms+num_morethan100ms+1)) AS "(1ms, 10ms]",
  AVG(num_lessthan100ms / (num_lessthan200us+num_lessthan400us+num_lessthan1ms+num_lessthan10ms+num_lessthan100ms+num_morethan100ms+1)) AS "(10ms, 100ms]",
  AVG(num_morethan100ms / (num_lessthan200us+num_lessthan400us+num_lessthan1ms+num_lessthan10ms+num_lessthan100ms+num_morethan100ms+1)) AS "(100ms, )"
FROM polar_gawr_collection.get_data_from_proper_table(NULL::${LogicInstance}.view_fact_polar_stat_io_latency, $__unixEpochFrom(), $__unixEpochTo(), ($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
WHERE
  physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}' AND iotype='open'
GROUP BY time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER) AS time,
  AVG(fs_blocks_usage) AS block使用率,
  AVG(fs_inodes_usage) AS inode使用率
FROM polar_gawr_collection.get_data_from_proper_table(NULL::${LogicInstance}.view_fact_dbmetrics, $__unixEpochFrom(), $__unixEpochTo(), ($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
WHERE
  physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}'
GROUP BY time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER) AS time,
  AVG(polar_base_dir_size) AS 数据目录大小,
  AVG(polar_wal_dir_size) AS WAL目录大小
FROM polar_gawr_collection.get_data_from_proper_table(NULL::${LogicInstance}.view_fact_dbmetrics, $__unixEpochFrom(), $__unixEpochTo(), ($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
WHERE
  physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}'
GROUP BY time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
                                   datname AS 数据库,
                                   relation AS 表,
                                   locktype AS 锁类型,
                                   mode AS 锁级别,
                                   query AS query,
                                   SUM(total_num)::BIGINT AS 累计阻塞采样会话数
                               FROM ${LogicInstance}.view_fact_polar_lock_contention_history
                               WHERE time BETWEEN $__unixEpochFrom() AND $__unixEpochTo() AND physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}'
                               GROUP BY 数据库, 表, 锁类型, 锁级别, query
                               ORDER BY 累计阻塞采样会话数 DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT
  time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER) AS time,
  AVG(connections) AS total,
  AVG(active_connections) AS active,
  AVG(idle_connections) AS idle
FROM polar_gawr_collection.get_data_from_proper_table(NULL::${LogicInstance}.view_fact_dbmetrics, $__unixEpochFrom(), $__unixEpochTo(), ($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
WHERE
  physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}'
GROUP BY time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER) AS time,
  AVG(active_transactions) AS active,
  AVG(idle_transactions) AS idle
FROM polar_gawr_collection.get_data_from_proper_table(NULL::${LogicInstance}.view_fact_dbmetrics, $__unixEpochFrom(), $__unixEpochTo(), ($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
WHERE
  physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}'
GROUP BY time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER) AS time,
  AVG(commits_delta) AS commits,
  AVG(rollbacks_delta) AS rollbacks,
  AVG(commits_delta+rollbacks_delta) AS TPS
FROM polar_gawr_collection.get_data_from_proper_table(NULL::${LogicInstance}.view_fact_dbmetrics, $__unixEpochFrom(), $__unixEpochTo(), ($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
WHERE
  physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}'
GROUP BY time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER) AS time,
  AVG(tup_returned_delta) AS tup_returned,
  AVG(tup_fetched_delta) AS tup_fetched,
  AVG(tup_inserted_delta) AS tup_inserted,
  AVG(tup_updated_delta) AS tup_updated,
  AVG(tup_deleted_delta) AS tup_deleted
FROM polar_gawr_collection.get_data_from_proper_table(NULL::${LogicInstance}.view_fact_dbmetrics, $__unixEpochFrom(), $__unixEpochTo(), ($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
WHERE
  physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}'
GROUP BY time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER) AS time,
  AVG(blks_read_delta) AS blks_read,
  AVG(blks_hit_delta) AS blks_hit
FROM polar_gawr_collection.get_data_from_proper_table(NULL::${LogicInstance}.view_fact_dbmetrics, $__unixEpochFrom(), $__unixEpochTo(), ($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
WHERE
  physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}'
GROUP BY time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__time(time_column),
  value1
FROM
  metric_table
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_column)

SELECT
  time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER) AS time,
  AVG(buffers_checkpoint_delta) AS checkpoint,
  AVG(buffers_backend_delta) AS backend,
  AVG(buffers_clean_delta) AS bgwriter
FROM polar_gawr_collection.get_data_from_proper_table(NULL::${LogicInstance}.view_fact_dbmetrics, $__unixEpochFrom(), $__unixEpochTo(), ($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
WHERE
  physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}'
GROUP BY time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__time(time_column),
  value1
FROM
  metric_table
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_column)

SELECT
  time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER) AS time,
  AVG(db_age) AS db_age
FROM polar_gawr_collection.get_data_from_proper_table(NULL::${LogicInstance}.view_fact_dbmetrics, $__unixEpochFrom(), $__unixEpochTo(), ($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
WHERE
  physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}'
GROUP BY time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER) AS time,
  AVG(swell_time) AS swell_time
FROM polar_gawr_collection.get_data_from_proper_table(NULL::${LogicInstance}.view_fact_dbmetrics, $__unixEpochFrom(), $__unixEpochTo(), ($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
WHERE
  physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}'
GROUP BY time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER) AS time,
  AVG(polar_dirtypage_size) AS polar_dirtypage_size
FROM polar_gawr_collection.get_data_from_proper_table(NULL::${LogicInstance}.view_fact_dbmetrics, $__unixEpochFrom(), $__unixEpochTo(), ($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
WHERE
  physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}'
GROUP BY time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER) AS time,
  AVG(polar_copybuffer_used_size) AS polar_copybuffer_used_size
FROM polar_gawr_collection.get_data_from_proper_table(NULL::${LogicInstance}.view_fact_dbmetrics, $__unixEpochFrom(), $__unixEpochTo(), ($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
WHERE
  physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}'
GROUP BY time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER) AS time,
  AVG(wp_cp_latency_mb) AS wp_cp_latency_mb,
  AVG(ap_cp_latency_mb) AS ap_cp_latency_mb,
  AVG(wp_ap_latency_mb) AS wp_ap_latency_mb
FROM polar_gawr_collection.get_data_from_proper_table(NULL::${LogicInstance}.view_fact_dbmetrics, $__unixEpochFrom(), $__unixEpochTo(), ($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
WHERE
  physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}'
GROUP BY time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER) AS time,
  application_name AS metric,
  AVG(replay_latency_mb) AS replay_latency_mb
FROM polar_gawr_collection.get_data_from_proper_table(NULL::${LogicInstance}.view_fact_replay_latency_mb, $__unixEpochFrom(), $__unixEpochTo(), ($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
WHERE
  physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}'
GROUP BY time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER), application_name
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER) AS time,
  AVG(logindex_mem_tbl_size) AS logindex_memtables
FROM polar_gawr_collection.get_data_from_proper_table(NULL::${LogicInstance}.view_fact_dbmetrics, $__unixEpochFrom(), $__unixEpochTo(), ($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
WHERE
  physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}'
GROUP BY time - time % (($__interval_ms / 1000)::INTEGER)
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: 以下数据需要开启pg_stat_statements插件

targets.rawSql:
WITH x AS (
                                      SELECT * FROM ${LogicInstance}.view_fact_polar_stat_top_sql
                                      WHERE time BETWEEN $__unixEpochFrom() AND $__unixEpochTo() AND physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}'
                               )
                               SELECT queryid AS queryid, query AS query,
                                   
                                   ROUND(SUM(total_time)::NUMERIC, 2) AS "累计执行时间(ms)",
                                   SUM(calls)::BIGINT AS value_执行次数,
                                   ROUND((SUM(total_time) / SUM(calls))::NUMERIC, 2) AS "平均执行时间(ms)",
                                   ROUND((SUM(blk_iotime) / SUM(total_time) * 100)::NUMERIC, 2) AS "IO时间占比(%)",
                                   SUM(logical_read)::BIGINT AS 逻辑读,
                                   SUM(blks_read)::BIGINT AS 物理读,
                                   SUM(logical_write)::BIGINT AS 逻辑写,
                                   SUM(blks_written)::BIGINT AS 物理写,
                                   SUM(rows)::BIGINT AS 处理行数
                               FROM x
                               GROUP BY queryid, query
                               ORDER BY SUM(total_time) DESC LIMIT 10

WITH x AS (
                                      SELECT * FROM ${LogicInstance}.view_fact_polar_stat_top_sql
                                      WHERE time BETWEEN $__unixEpochFrom() AND $__unixEpochTo() AND physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}'
                               )
                               SELECT queryid, query,
                                   ROUND(SUM(total_time)::NUMERIC, 2) AS "累计执行时间(ms)",
                                   SUM(calls)::BIGINT AS value_执行次数,
                                   ROUND((SUM(total_time) / SUM(calls))::NUMERIC, 2) AS "平均执行时间(ms)",
                                   ROUND((SUM(blk_iotime) / SUM(total_time) * 100)::NUMERIC, 2) AS "IO时间占比(%)",
                                   SUM(logical_read)::BIGINT AS 逻辑读,
                                   SUM(blks_read)::BIGINT AS 物理读,
                                   SUM(logical_write)::BIGINT AS 逻辑写,
                                   SUM(blks_written)::BIGINT AS 物理写,
                                   SUM(rows)::BIGINT AS 处理行数
                               FROM x
                               GROUP BY queryid, query
                               ORDER BY "平均执行时间(ms)" DESC LIMIT 10

WITH x AS (
                                      SELECT * FROM ${LogicInstance}.view_fact_polar_stat_top_sql
                                      WHERE time BETWEEN $__unixEpochFrom() AND $__unixEpochTo() AND physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}'
                               )
                               SELECT queryid, query,
                                   ROUND(SUM(blk_read_time)::NUMERIC, 2) AS "累计读IO时间(ms)",
                                   SUM(calls)::BIGINT AS value_执行次数,
                                   ROUND((SUM(total_time) / SUM(calls))::NUMERIC, 2) AS "平均执行时间(ms)",
                                   ROUND((SUM(blk_read_time) / SUM(calls))::NUMERIC, 2) AS "平均读IO时间(ms)",
                                   ROUND((SUM(blk_read_time) / SUM(total_time) * 100)::NUMERIC, 2) AS "读IO耗时占比(%)",
                                   ROUND((SUM(logical_read) / SUM(calls))::NUMERIC, 2) AS 平均逻辑读,
                                   ROUND((SUM(blks_read) / SUM(calls))::NUMERIC, 2) AS 平均物理读,
                                   CASE WHEN SUM(logical_read) < 1 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND((SUM(blks_hit) / SUM(logical_read) * 100)::NUMERIC, 2) END AS "读缓存命中率(%)",
                                   ROUND((SUM(rows) / SUM(calls))::NUMERIC, 2) AS 平均处理行数
                               FROM x
                               GROUP BY queryid, query
                               ORDER BY SUM(blk_read_time) DESC LIMIT 10

WITH x AS (
                                      SELECT * FROM ${LogicInstance}.view_fact_polar_stat_top_sql
                                      WHERE time BETWEEN $__unixEpochFrom() AND $__unixEpochTo() AND physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}'
                               )
                               SELECT queryid, query,
                                   ROUND(SUM(blk_write_time)::NUMERIC, 2) AS "累计写IO时间(ms)",
                                   SUM(calls)::BIGINT AS value_执行次数,
                                   ROUND((SUM(total_time) / SUM(calls))::NUMERIC, 2) AS "平均执行时间(ms)",
                                   ROUND((SUM(blk_write_time) / SUM(calls))::NUMERIC, 2) AS "平均写IO时间(ms)",
                                   ROUND((SUM(blk_write_time) / SUM(total_time) * 100)::NUMERIC, 2) AS "写IO耗时占比(%)",
                                   ROUND((SUM(logical_write) / SUM(calls))::NUMERIC, 2) AS 平均逻辑写,
                                   ROUND((SUM(blks_written) / SUM(calls))::NUMERIC, 2) AS 平均物理写,
                                   CASE WHEN SUM(logical_write) < 1 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND((SUM(blks_hit) / SUM(logical_write) * 100)::NUMERIC, 2) END AS "写缓存命中率(%)",
                                   ROUND((SUM(rows) / SUM(calls))::NUMERIC, 2) AS 平均处理行数
                               FROM x
                               GROUP BY queryid, query
                               ORDER BY SUM(blk_write_time) DESC LIMIT 10

panels.title: 以下数据查询间隔建议放大至一小时以上

targets.rawSql:
WITH x AS (
                                   SELECT *
                                   FROM ${LogicInstance}.view_fact_polar_stat_user_tables
                                   WHERE time BETWEEN $__unixEpochFrom() AND $__unixEpochTo() AND physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}'
                               )
                               SELECT
                                   dbname AS 数据库,
                                   schemaname AS schema,
                                   relname AS 表,
                                   SUM(seq_scan)::BIGINT AS 顺序扫描次数,
                                   SUM(seq_tup_read)::BIGINT AS 扫描行数
                               FROM x
                               GROUP BY dbname, schemaname, relname HAVING SUM(seq_tup_read) > 0.1
                               ORDER BY 扫描行数 DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT
                                   dbname AS 数据库,
                                   schemaname AS schema,
                                   relname AS 表,
                                   SUM(idx_scan)::BIGINT AS 索引扫描次数,
                                   SUM(idx_tup_fetch)::BIGINT AS 索引扫描行数
                               FROM ${LogicInstance}.view_fact_polar_stat_user_tables
                               WHERE time BETWEEN $__unixEpochFrom() AND $__unixEpochTo() AND physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}'
                               GROUP BY dbname, schemaname, relname HAVING SUM(idx_tup_fetch) > 0.1
                               ORDER BY 索引扫描行数 DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT
                                   dbname AS 数据库,
                                   schemaname AS schema,
                                   relname AS 表,
                                   SUM(n_tup_ins)::BIGINT AS 插入行数,
                                   SUM(n_tup_upd)::BIGINT AS 更新行数,
                                   SUM(n_tup_hot_upd)::BIGINT AS HOT更新行数,
                                   SUM(n_tup_del)::BIGINT AS 删除行数,
                                   SUM(n_tup_modified)::BIGINT AS 总变更行数
                               FROM ${LogicInstance}.view_fact_polar_stat_user_tables
                               WHERE time BETWEEN $__unixEpochFrom() AND $__unixEpochTo() AND physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}'
                               GROUP BY dbname, schemaname, relname HAVING SUM(n_tup_modified) > 0.1
                               ORDER BY 总变更行数 DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT
                                   dbname AS 数据库,
                                   schemaname AS schema,
                                   relname AS 表,
                                   SUM(n_tup_ins)::BIGINT AS 插入行数,
                                   SUM(n_tup_upd)::BIGINT AS 更新行数,
                                   SUM(n_tup_hot_upd)::BIGINT AS HOT更新行数,
                                   SUM(n_tup_del)::BIGINT AS 删除行数,
                                   SUM(n_tup_modified)::BIGINT AS 总变更行数
                               FROM ${LogicInstance}.view_fact_polar_stat_user_tables
                               WHERE time BETWEEN $__unixEpochFrom() AND $__unixEpochTo() AND physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}'
                               GROUP BY dbname, schemaname, relname HAVING SUM(n_tup_modified) > 0.1
                               ORDER BY 总变更行数 DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT
                                   dbname AS 数据库,
                                   schemaname AS schema,
                                   relname AS 表,
                                   indexrelname AS 索引,
                                   SUM(idx_scan)::BIGINT AS 扫描次数,
                                   SUM(idx_tup_fetch)::BIGINT AS 返回行数,
                                   SUM(idx_tup_read)::BIGINT AS 扫描行数
                               FROM ${LogicInstance}.view_fact_polar_stat_user_indexes
                               WHERE time BETWEEN $__unixEpochFrom() AND $__unixEpochTo() AND physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}'
                               GROUP BY 数据库, schema, 表, 索引 HAVING SUM(idx_tup_read) > 0.1
                               ORDER BY 扫描行数 DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT
                                   dbname AS 数据库,
                                   schemaname AS schema,
                                   relname AS 表,
                                   SUM(heap_logical_read)::BIGINT AS 逻辑读,
                                   SUM(heap_blks_read)::BIGINT AS 物理读,
                                   ROUND((SUM(heap_blks_hit) / SUM(heap_logical_read) * 100)::NUMERIC, 2) AS "缓存命中率(%)"
                               FROM ${LogicInstance}.view_fact_polar_statio_user_tables
                               WHERE time BETWEEN $__unixEpochFrom() AND $__unixEpochTo() AND physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}'
                               GROUP BY 数据库, schema, 表 HAVING SUM(heap_logical_read) > 0.1
                               ORDER BY 逻辑读 DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT
                                   dbname AS 数据库,
                                   schemaname AS schema,
                                   relname AS 表,
                                   SUM(idx_logical_read)::BIGINT AS 逻辑读,
                                   SUM(idx_blks_read)::BIGINT AS 物理读,
                                   ROUND((SUM(idx_blks_hit) / (SUM(idx_logical_read)+1) * 100)::NUMERIC, 2) AS "缓存命中率(%)"
                               FROM ${LogicInstance}.view_fact_polar_statio_user_tables
                               WHERE time BETWEEN $__unixEpochFrom() AND $__unixEpochTo() AND physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}'
                               GROUP BY 数据库, schema, 表 HAVING SUM(heap_logical_read) > 0.1
                               ORDER BY 逻辑读 DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT
                                   dbname AS 数据库,
                                   schemaname AS schema,
                                   relname AS 表,
                                   indexrelname AS 索引,
                                   SUM(idx_logical_read)::BIGINT AS 逻辑读,
                                   SUM(idx_blks_read)::BIGINT AS 物理读,
                                   ROUND((SUM(idx_blks_hit) / SUM(idx_logical_read) * 100)::NUMERIC, 2) AS "缓存命中率(%)"
                               FROM ${LogicInstance}.view_fact_polar_statio_user_indexes
                               WHERE time BETWEEN $__unixEpochFrom() AND $__unixEpochTo() AND physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}'
                               GROUP BY 数据库, schema, 表, 索引 HAVING SUM(idx_logical_read) > 0.1
                               ORDER BY 逻辑读 DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT
                                   dbname AS 数据库,
                                   schemaname AS schema,
                                   relname AS 表,
                                   CASE WHEN relkind='r' THEN '表'
                                        WHEN relkind='i' THEN '索引'
                                        WHEN relkind='S' THEN '序列'
                                        WHEN relkind='t' THEN 'TOAST表'
                                        ELSE '其它' END AS 类型,
                                   ROUND(relsize_total::NUMERIC / 1024, 2) AS "估计空间占用(GB)"
                               FROM ${LogicInstance}.view_fact_polar_stat_relation_size
                               WHERE time = (SELECT MAX(time) FROM ${LogicInstance}.view_fact_polar_stat_relation_size WHERE time BETWEEN $__unixEpochFrom() AND $__unixEpochTo() AND physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}')
                                   AND physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}' AND relsize_total > 0.01
                               ORDER BY relsize_total DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT
                                   dbname AS 数据库,
                                   schemaname AS schema,
                                   relname AS 表,
                                   CASE WHEN relkind='r' THEN '表'
                                        WHEN relkind='i' THEN '索引'
                                        WHEN relkind='S' THEN '序列'
                                        WHEN relkind='t' THEN 'TOAST表'
                                        ELSE '其它' END AS 类型,
                                   table_age::BIGINT AS value_年龄,
                                   ROUND((table_age / 2147483647 * 100)::NUMERIC, 2) AS "绕卷比例(%)"
                            FROM ${LogicInstance}.view_fact_polar_stat_table_age
                            WHERE time = (SELECT MAX(time) FROM ${LogicInstance}.view_fact_polar_stat_table_age WHERE time BETWEEN $__unixEpochFrom() AND $__unixEpochTo() AND physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}')
                            ORDER BY table_age DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT
                                   dbname AS 数据库,
                                   schemaname AS schema,
                                   relname AS 表,
                                   n_live_tup::BIGINT AS 活跃元组,
                                   n_dead_tup::BIGINT AS 死亡元组,
                                   ROUND(dead_tup_ratio::NUMERIC, 2) AS "死亡元组比例(%)",
                                   CASE WHEN last_vacuum<0.1 THEN '未做过' ELSE ROUND(((time - last_vacuum) / 60)::NUMERIC, 1)::TEXT END AS "距上次vacuum(分钟)",
                                   CASE WHEN last_autovacuum<0.1 THEN '未做过' ELSE ROUND(((time - last_autovacuum) / 60)::NUMERIC, 1)::TEXT END AS "距上次autovacuum(分钟)"
                               FROM ${LogicInstance}.view_fact_polar_stat_user_tables
                               WHERE time = (SELECT MAX(time) FROM ${LogicInstance}.view_fact_polar_stat_user_tables WHERE time BETWEEN $__unixEpochFrom() AND $__unixEpochTo() AND physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}')
                                   AND physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}'
                               ORDER BY dead_tup_ratio DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT
                                   dbname AS 数据库,
                                   schemaname AS schema,
                                   relname AS 表,
                                   n_mod_since_analyze::BIGINT AS analyze后更新行数,
                                   CASE WHEN last_analyze<0.1 THEN '未做过' ELSE ROUND(((time - last_analyze) / 60)::NUMERIC, 1)::TEXT END AS "距上次analyze(分钟)\",
                                   CASE WHEN last_autoanalyze<0.1 THEN '未做过' ELSE ROUND(((time - last_autoanalyze) / 60)::NUMERIC, 1)::TEXT END AS "距上次autoanalyze(分钟)"
                            FROM ${LogicInstance}.view_fact_polar_stat_user_tables
                            WHERE time = (SELECT MAX(time) FROM ${LogicInstance}.view_fact_polar_stat_user_tables WHERE time BETWEEN $__unixEpochFrom() AND $__unixEpochTo() AND physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}')
                            ORDER BY n_mod_since_analyze DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT name AS 名称, source AS 来源, MAX(setting) AS 值, TO_CHAR(TO_TIMESTAMP(MAX(time)), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS 时间
                               FROM ${LogicInstance}.view_fact_polar_settings
                               WHERE time BETWEEN $__unixEpochFrom() AND $__unixEpochTo() AND physical_ins_name='${PhysicalInstance}' AND source NOT IN ('client', 'session')
                               GROUP BY name, source
                               ORDER BY
                                   CASE source
                                          WHEN 'configuration file' THEN 1
                                          WHEN 'override' THEN 2
                                          WHEN 'default' THEN 3
                                          ELSE 4 END
